Description: Poster showing each country--Poland, Austria, Egypt, Turkey--personified as an edible for the Kaiser who is cooking them one by one in a cooking pot over a fire.  A dove carrying an olive branch and the US flag floats overhead.  Seven stanzas of verse in Russian "The Menu."

Title: Evropeyskaya kukhnya (Европейская кухня)
